product_name: Lowa Gavia GTX Hiking Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With a focus on comfort and support, the waterproof, women-specific Lowa Gavia GTX boots are well-suited for day hikes and weekend backpacking trips. Water-repellent nubuck leather uppers are durable and flexible, offering lasting protection and comfort; rubber toe and heel caps protect uppers from abrasion. GORE-TEX(R) membranes keep out the wet stuff while still allowing your feet to breathe; polyester linings manage excess moisture to keep feet dry. Asymmetric padded tongues, soft edging, recessed ankle cuts and curved inserts combine for tailored comfort across insteps. Polyurethane midsoles offer outstanding cushioning for all-day wear; midsoles allow for normal pronation but reduce excess cushioning to enhance stability. Lowa Gavia GTX hiking boots feature nylon shanks for enhanced torsional rigidity to protect and support feet. X-lacing system features easy-to-pull laces through ball-bearing loops so you can fine-tune the fit. Vibram(R) Masai rubber outsoles feature aggressive lugs and self-cleaning tread for excellent downhill traction. Closeout.
short_description: With a focus on comfort and support, the waterproof, women-specific Lowa Gavia GTX boots are well-suited for day hikes and weekend backpacking trips.
